meaningMnemonic: You know that 狩り is hunting already. This is the same thing (<vocabulary>hunting</vocabulary>). Difference is this one is attached to other words to specify what kind of hunting you're doing.
readingMnemonic:
The reading is the same as 狩り, but since it follows another word, it gets rendaku-ed. Here is a mnemonic to help with remembering the rendaku.

Hunting can be <reading>girly</reading> (がり), if you dress up like a girly hunter.
